Introduction¶

Philosophy¶

This API is being developed with the following philosophy in mind.

  1. Allow fast access to the entire database.
  2. Make sensible default choices for the user (e.g., avoid high signal to noise ratio records).
  3. Allow easy overriding of default choices.
  4. To provide methods that are consistent across programming languages (e.g., Matlab, Python, R)
  5. Follow the ideals of PEP 20 as closely as possible.
